mapper.sql: img.id, img.create_date createDate, img.modify_date modifyDate, img.house_flow_apply_id houseFlowApplyId, img.image_url imageUrl, img.image_type imageType, img.data_status dataStatus, img.image_type_name imageTypeName
mapper.select: SELECT b.image_url AS imageUrl FROM dj_core_house_flow_apply a INNER JOIN dj_core_house_flow_apply_image b ON a.id = b.house_flow_apply_id WHERE a.house_id = #{houseId} AND b.image_type = 2 AND b.data_status = 0 AND b.image_url IS NOT NULL AND a.apply_type in (1,2,5) ORDER BY b.create_date DESC LIMIT 1
